tool_description: API for real time Air Quality Index from various locations.
name: Air Quality Index India
title: Air Quality Index India

api_list.name: Get State list
api_list.description: Get list of state in country.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://air-quality-index-india.p.rapidapi.com/getstatelist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "air-quality-index-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://air-quality-index-india.p.rapidapi.com/getstatelist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "air-quality-index-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
